name: Commodore Format Power Pack 32
description:
Commodore Format Power Pack 32 is a collection of games, demos and utilities found attached to the cover of the monthly Commodore 64 magazine Commodore Format in Cassette form. Issue 32 (May 1993) contains:
  • Thrust (Full Game)
  • Corya (Part 1) (Full Game)
  • Steel (Full Game)
  • FROST: A sprite creation program written especially for Commodore Format (Utility)
  • Multihack Pokes: A program with listings and pokes already typed in for a collection of games to cheat at (Utility)
